privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Transparent overview of all information collected and stored by Mineflared
privacy.intro_desc: This document explains, in a transparent and detailed way, all information collected, processed and stored by the Mineflared project, both in the frontend (CLI) and backend (API). The goal is to ensure all users are fully informed about data handling.
privacy.frontend_config_desc: A <1>config.json</1> file is saved in the user's directory (<3>$HOME/.config/minecli/config.json</3> or equivalent). It contains:
privacy.frontend_config_local: Important: This information remains local on the user's machine and is not sent to third parties (except during explicit backend interactions).
privacy.frontend_ip_desc: When logging in or updating DNS, the CLI collects the machine's public IP address using services such as <1>https://api.ipify.org</1> or <3>https://ipwho.is</3>. This IP is sent to the backend for subdomain creation/update.
privacy.backend_data_title: 2. Data Collected and Stored in Backend (API)
privacy.backend_desc: Mineflared backend, implemented in Node.js using Fastify and MongoDB, collects and stores information for authentication, domain management and overall system operation.
privacy.backend_db_desc: When authenticating via GitHub, the following information is saved in the <1>users</1> collection:
privacy.backend_dns_desc: When creating or updating the subdomain, the backend sends <1>username</1> and <3>ip</3> to the Cloudflare API, creating/updating an A record for the subdomain <5><username>.<domain></5>. No sensitive data is exposed publicly in this process, except the username and IP attached to the subdomain.
privacy.backend_delete_desc: When the user requests deletion (<1>mineflared delete</1>), the backend removes:
privacy.no_data_personal: Personal data besides username, ID and IP
privacy.sharing_github_desc: Only OAuth is used for authentication; email, real name or other GitHub data is not collected.
privacy.sharing_cf_desc: Receives only the subdomain and IP for DNS creation/removal.
privacy.sharing_third_desc: No data is shared with third parties, except for the integrations above.
privacy.purposes_personal_desc: Chosen language and username for CLI personalization
privacy.purposes_dns_desc: IP and username to create or update subdomain in Cloudflare
privacy.purposes_local_desc: Token and options saved locally for easier CLI recurring use
privacy.security_jwt: JWT tokens are encrypted using a secure secret on the backend
privacy.security_no_share: Tokens and sensitive data should never be shared publicly
privacy.security_config: The local config file is saved with restricted permission (0600) to protect the user
privacy.delete_desc: When deletion is requested, all data associated with the username is removed from the database and Cloudflare. This action is irreversible.
privacy.contact_desc: Questions, requests or complaints can be directed to the project maintainer:
privacy.footer_desc: Mineflared is committed to transparency and user data protection. This policy will be updated whenever there are significant changes in data handling.
